trends: There have been no other sightings in Chesnee
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1. I was taking pictures to put on my familys website2. I was looking around for some good landscape pics and I paused, then i beganto go back inside and I noticed it when i turned around.3. I thought maybe I had starred too long in the sky the sun caused a blurriedimage.4. I was startled at first..rubbed my eyes and then looked at it through mydigital camera and saw the same thing. I knew then it was not the sun playinggames on me. I thought it would be great to get a pic to show my father.5. Oval mishaped object..hovered above the tree line...and I could see the sunreflecting off of it. had a very shiny look like a mirror hung in the sky. andit just hovered there...and motionless..6. I thought it was just crazy natural effect and went back inside and thought Ilook at the pic on my computer...10 mins later...i went back out and it wasgone.
